com.gif4j
Class CurtainFilter

java.lang.Object
  com.gif4j.MorphingFilter
      com.gif4j.CurtainFilter

public class CurtainFilter
extends MorphingFilter

An instance of CurtainFilter implements the gradual appearance animation in the form of tableau curtains consist of one or two segments.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Gif4J Software - Java GIF image processing solutions

Constructor Detail

CurtainFilter

public CurtainFilter(int moveFromTo)
Constructs CellFilter of one of the predefined move types, default frames number = 8 and delay between frames = 0.1 sec (10 1/100 sec)

Parameters:
moveFromTo - one of the predefined move types: MOVE_FROM_LEFT_RIGHT_TO_CENTER, MOVE_FROM_CENTER_TO_LEFT_RIGHT, MOVE_FROM_LEFT_TO_RIGHT, MOVE_FROM_RIGHT_TO_LEFT, MOVE_FROM_TOP_BOTTOM_TO_MIDDLE, MOVE_FROM_MIDDLE_TO_TOP_BOTTOM, MOVE_FROM_TOP_TO_BOTTOM, MOVE_FROM_BOTTOM_TO_TOP
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If unknown moveFromTo type

CurtainFilter

public CurtainFilter(int moveFromTo,
                     int framesNumber)
Constructs CellFilter of one of the predefined move types, the specified frames number and default delay between frames = 0.1 sec (10 1/100 sec)

Parameters:
moveFromTo - one of the predefined move types: MOVE_FROM_LEFT_RIGHT_TO_CENTER, MOVE_FROM_CENTER_TO_LEFT_RIGHT, MOVE_FROM_LEFT_TO_RIGHT, MOVE_FROM_RIGHT_TO_LEFT, MOVE_FROM_TOP_BOTTOM_TO_MIDDLE, MOVE_FROM_MIDDLE_TO_TOP_BOTTOM, MOVE_FROM_TOP_TO_BOTTOM, MOVE_FROM_BOTTOM_TO_TOP
framesNumber - how many frames the result animation should contain (must be greater than 1).
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If unknown move type
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If frames number less than 2

CurtainFilter

public CurtainFilter(int moveFromTo,
                     int framesNumber,
                     int delayBetweenFrames)
Constructs CellFilter of one of the predefined move types, the specified frames number and delay between frames

Parameters:
moveFromTo - one of the predefined move types: MOVE_FROM_LEFT_RIGHT_TO_CENTER, MOVE_FROM_CENTER_TO_LEFT_RIGHT, MOVE_FROM_LEFT_TO_RIGHT, MOVE_FROM_RIGHT_TO_LEFT, MOVE_FROM_TOP_BOTTOM_TO_MIDDLE, MOVE_FROM_MIDDLE_TO_TOP_BOTTOM, MOVE_FROM_TOP_TO_BOTTOM, MOVE_FROM_BOTTOM_TO_TOP
framesNumber - how many frames the result animation should contain (must be greater than 1).
delayBetweenFrames - delay time in 1/100 seconds (100 means 1 second delay) between generated frames.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If unknown moveFromTo type
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If frames number less than 2
